statements: SELECT * FROM project_documents WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM project_documents WHERE document_access_level = 'public';
SELECT document_owner, document_content FROM project_documents WHERE document_access_level = 'private';
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_owner FROM project_documents WHERE document_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT document_id, document_access_level FROM project_documents WHERE document_id > 2;
SELECT document_name, document_owner FROM project_documents WHERE document_access_level = 'public';
SELECT * FROM project_documents WHERE document_owner = 'John Smith';
SELECT document_name, document_content FROM project_documents WHERE document_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY document_name DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_owner FROM project_documents WHERE document_access_level = 'private' AND document_owner LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT document_name, UPPER(document_owner) AS capitalized_owner FROM project_documents WHERE document_owner IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_deadline FROM projects WHERE project_deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT file_name, file_type, file_size FROM project_files;
SELECT project_name, file_name, file_uploaded_at FROM projects JOIN project_files ON projects.project_id = project_files.project_id;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects;
SELECT * FROM project_files WHERE file_type = 'PDF';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_deadline FROM projects WHERE project_deadline > NOW();
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM project_files ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects JOIN project_files ON projects.project_id = project_files.project_id;
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM Projects WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT document_title, document_content, created_at FROM Documents WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT file_name, file_size, file_path FROM Files WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM Projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%example%';
SELECT document_title, document_content FROM Documents JOIN Projects ON Documents.project_id = Projects.project_id WHERE Projects.project_name = 'Example Project';
SELECT file_name, file_size, file_path FROM Files WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer' ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT document_name, created_at FROM project_documents WHERE document_content IS NOT NULL;
SELECT document_id, COUNT(comment_id) AS total_comments FROM document_comments GROUP BY document_id HAVING total_comments > 5;
SELECT file_name, file_type, member_name AS uploaded_by FROM file_attachments JOIN team_members ON uploaded_by = member_id;
SELECT * FROM project_documents;
SELECT document_name, created_at FROM project_documents WHERE document_id = 2;
SELECT document_name, document_content FROM project_documents WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT member_name, email FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, document_type, created_by FROM documents WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_name, leader FROM teams WHERE description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT file_name, file_path, uploaded_by, uploaded_at FROM file_storage ORDER BY uploaded_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, description FROM projects WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, leader, description FROM teams WHERE leader = 'John Doe';
SELECT document_name, document_type, created_at FROM documents WHERE created_by = 'Alice';
